game.name: Stellar Raiders
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Stellar Raiders is a turn-based tactics roguelike where you lead a crew of space pirates, raid enemy ships, and grab as much loot as you can before making your escape.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Stellar Raiders is a turn-based tactics roguelike where you lead a crew of space pirates, raid enemy ships, and grab as much loot as you can before making your escape.
